actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Heal [Cast, Touch] (1/Day): Regains 7 (2d6) HP and removes the Blinded, Confused, Paralyzed, or Sickened Status
Multi-Attack: 2×Hoof and 1×Horn
Hoof [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8)
Horn [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8)
Teleport [Cast] (1/Day): Teleports itself and any Being mounting it up to Far

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Magic Ward III: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d8 penalty.
Regenerate I: Regains 4 (d8) HP on each of its Turns.
